                #      ##  #  #       ##   #  #   #      
                ####   # # #  ####    ##   ####   ####

                ####   #   #  ####   ####  #  #   ####   
                             2021  -  2022


This package is a school project from Prof. Naoum (ENSIAS - 2IA)

It treats minimization algorithms applied to functions (not data tables), also linear system solving using Gauss Jordan, Cholseki and LU decomposition.
The package is divided to 3 parts:

unidimension
======

 > fixedstepsize
 > Accstepsize
 > exhaustive
 > dichotomous
 > intervalhalving
 > fibonacci
 > goldsection
 > newton
 > quasinewton
 > secant


multidimension
========

 > gradient
 > conjgradient
 > newton
 > quasinewton


LinearSys
=========

 > gaussjordan
 > choleski
 > ludecomposition
